title: Most Satisfying Sound(s) In League?
body:
Title.

I think for me it has to be {{item:3742}}'s proc sound when fully charged.

Runner ups:
{{champion:30}}'s Dance (His "Raaaaa!")
{{champion:37}} "Laugh" Chime Jingle
{{champion:202}} Ult Music (Might be because of how rarely I play Jhin)
{{champion:432}} Sounds after getting a Chime
{{summoner:4}} Sound
{{champion:53}} "The time of man has come to an end!"
{{champion:429}} "Crawl!"
{{champion:17}} Saying Teemo
{{champion:203}} (Lamb's voice especially)
